argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latabs1.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latabs1.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | latabs1.m | |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_latlej1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> X ( le ` K ) ( X .\/ Y ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_latjcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 3 | #P_latleeqm1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) -> ( X ( le ` K ) ( X .\/ Y ) <-> ( X ./\ ( X .\/ Y ) ) = X ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syld3an3 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ( le ` K ) ( X .\/ Y ) <-> ( X ./\ ( X .\/ Y ) ) = X ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ./\ ( X .\/ Y ) ) = X ) |
